Find nearest BOM weather stations

Find nearest BOM weather stations

sweep_for_stations(latlon = c(-35.3, 149.2))

Arguments

latlon

A length-2 numeric vector. By default, Canberra (approximately).

Value

A data frame of all weather stations (in this package) sorted by distance from latlon, ascending.

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
